name: Ted Piorczynski
title: Impressive debut novel
review: Excalibur's Pendragon, the first book (of hopefully many) recounting the Aethervard Legacy, introduces an Arthurian-based tale of duty, courage, and love set in an imaginative, fantasy-filled world. Parker's unbridled passion and keen storytelling create a page-turning adventure that marries mature themes with a fun narrative. I am already eagerly awaiting the next addition to the series!

name: Taylor
title: Captivating read that is full of adventure
review: Loving this book so far! Parker is very creative and an excellent author. Can’t wait to finish this book and for him to publish book number two!!

name: BTBingham
title: Great read from first time author Parker Wilson
review: I enjoyed reading this book. The genre is high school teenage fantasy. I am familiar with this genre. I have read the Michael Vey series, even the latest #8. Parker’s book, Excalibur’s Pendragon, draws you in and is a good page turner. It is an exciting read where you care about Ryan and the challenges he faces. It is fun to see how Parker creates a modern day story and world around the King Arthur legacy. The story has monsters, wizards, reluctant heroes and villains. It was entertaining. It also has a good message of having faith and hope when making decisions and choosing your own path. I will eagerly await the next book in this series and order it as soon as it comes out.

name: Tanner Redding
title: Amazing!
review: I hope that this is the first of many in this series. Parker is an incredible author and truly has a gift. His writing transports the reader to another time and place, and this, to me, is what reading is all about. I have loved this book so far and hope that there are many more to come.
